hand.name: Untrained
hand.desc: Basic, poorly-formed punches and kicks make up your entire repertoire.

hand.name: Basic Kickboxing
hand.desc: Knowing how to throw your weight around allows you to concentrate force properly while also saving energy with your movements.

hand.name: Sanaite CQC
hand.desc: Hell priestess hand-to-hand techniques, imbued with sacred blessings that multiplies the force of your blows against primordial demons.

weapons.name: Club
weapons.desc: A stick that's kinda heavy on one end. Doesn't have an edge to wear out.

weapons.name: Hatchet
weapons.desc: A small axe. It's handy and light, but it gives good leverage for savage strikes.

weapons.name: Jon-Kiyo
weapons.desc: It's a curved greatsword that can reportedly chop a horse in half. It's too heavy for Kekolu to use.
